title: Grimm's Law: The Fairy Tale Linguist
description: One-minute skill: Grimm's Law: The Fairy Tale Linguist.

hook.text: Jacob Grimm didn't just collect fairy tales. He discovered a law that explains why Germanic languages sound different.

buildup.text: Grimm noticed that Latin 'p' consistently becomes 'f' in Germanic: pater/father, piscis/fish, pes/foot.

twist.text: Grimm's Law was one of the first proofs that languages change by regular, predictable rules â€” not randomly.

climax.text: His discovery helped establish linguistics as a science rather than a hobby for scholars.

punchline.text: The man who gave us Cinderella also gave us proof that language follows laws.
